name: WhenTheyArrive
description:
When they arrive is a Third Person PC game that will be developed by “BadCats Studios”. 

The protagonist who wakes up in another timeline who’s being taken in by the leader of a small fortress, has to prepare himself and his allies for a great threat that is heading their way in 5 HOURS' time.

[Download and Extract "WhenTheyArrive.zip", open the file  "Windows" then play "WhenTheyArrive.exe"]
